column5: FYI YOU CAN NO LONGER USE FROGS OR SALAMANDERS A/K WATERDOGS FOR BAIT IN SASKATCHEWAN..NOT LISTED YET BUT FISHERIES HAS CONFIRMED SAME...

Is this gonna be noted in the 2002 guide you get with your license? I looked at last year's and no mention was made of this. Did they give any policy reason for the decision?I don't use either, but would be concerned if all of a sudden no leeches or worms are allowed either.derrek.CANADIAN WALLEYE OPEN UP AND SAY "EH"!
